short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Multichain multisig wallet that supports Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Litecoin, Dogecoin, Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WH Cyhper is multisig wallet that supports Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Litecoin, Dogecoin, Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, Polygon, Avalanche and ERC20 tokens in one application. It is a unique solution that provides easy way to create wallets that controlled by multiple users at once. Create cryptocurrency wallets that are controlled by many users and store there your desired assets. It fits best for teams or organizations that require joint funds control.
